comment.author: 43303939@N07
comment._content:
Ludwig Satz is my great grandfather.  This photo is hanging on my wall when you walk into my home.  Also in the photo is my grandmother Lily, my grandmother Celia, my great cousin Selwyn Freed.

I have so many of these pictures...

Deborah

comment.author: 43303939@N07
comment._content: Actually I have almost all of the names in the photo.. I would be more than happy to share the information since I have the original photo. And many more photos of Ludwig.

comment.author: 49063994@N03
comment._content:
The young boy identified as Celia Adler's son is my cousin, Dr. Selwyn Freed, and is indeed the son of Celia Adler and Lazar Freed.  To the right of Ludwig Satz (my grandfather) is my grandmother, Lilly Feinman Satz, who was the sister of Celia Adler, she's dressed as a gypsy.  Lilly and Celia were daughters of Dinah Feinman, also an actress, who was married to Jacob P. Adler.

My mother is the little girl on the far left, also dressed as a gypsy, Celia Satz Werner.   Her sister, the little girl with her hands on her ears is my aunt Mimi Satz Schiff.   I believe the man in the first row, third from the left is Eddie Cantor.   However, I am emailing this to my cousin Selwyn, who at 92 is sharp as a whip, and will be able to identify as many people as possible, if not all!
